message: My turn. This is a bit more in my favor, but still allows us both to benefit.  Let's wrap this up quickly before inflation eats our potential gains.
Okay Alice, time is literally money!  This is almost an even split. Take the deal and let's both come out ahead.
Alice, this back and forth is pointless. I'm taking a stand. 50/50 split. Take it or leave it, but every round costs us both money.
